code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import images from"../img/images.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PopUp(_ref){let{show,onClose,song}=_ref;const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState(calculateTimeLeft());useEffect(()=>{if(!show)return;const timer=setInterval(()=>{setTimeLeft(calculateTimeLeft());},1000);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[show]);if(!show)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex justify-center items-center z-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-zinc-900 rounded-lg p-6 shadow-lg w-80",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[song.album],alt:"Album Cover",className:"w-full h-auto mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Game Over!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg mb-2",children:"The correct song was:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:song.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-lg mb-2",children:"New Song In:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:formatTimeLeft(timeLeft)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClose,className:"mt-4 w-full py-2 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-primary-gold transition-colors duration-150",children:"Close"})]})});}function calculateTimeLeft(){const now=new Date();const midnight=new Date(now);midnight.setHours(24,0,0,0);const difference=midnight-now;return{hours:Math.floor(difference/(1000*60*60)%24),minutes:Math.floor(difference/1000/60%60),seconds:Math.floor(difference/1000%60)};}function formatTimeLeft(timeLeft){return"".concat(timeLeft.hours,"h ").concat(timeLeft.minutes,"m ").concat(timeLeft.seconds,"s");}export default PopUp;
